name: Treasure Trek
description:
Treasure Trek is short prototype of a zelda-inspired adventure game developed by a team of 5 using Unreal Engine 4. Brave the mines with only your lantern as you navigate past traps and puzzles to find the treasure! 

Credits:

Arlo Ptolemy - Game Design, 3D Asset Creation, Level Design

Dave Sabrowski - Game Design, Lead Programmer

Drew Swanson - Game Design, Concept Artist, 2D Asset Creation, Music Composer

Kayla Aiman - Game Design, 3D Asset Creation, Animation

Roxy Hong - Game Design, Texture Artist, SFX Design
